comment: * Rule instance information for zen mode.

methods.name: public ComponentName getOwner()
methods.comment: * Returns the {@link ComponentName} of the condition provider service that owns this rule.

methods.name: public ComponentName getConfigurationActivity()
methods.comment:
* Returns the {@link ComponentName} of the activity that shows configuration options
     * for this rule.

methods.name: public Uri getConditionId()
methods.comment: * Returns the representation of the state that causes this rule to become active.

methods.name: public int getInterruptionFilter()
methods.comment: * Returns the interruption filter that is applied when this rule is active.

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: * Returns the name of this rule.

methods.name: public boolean isEnabled()
methods.comment: * Returns whether this rule is enabled.

methods.name: public boolean isModified()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether this rule's name has been modified by the user.
     * @hide

methods.name: public long getCreationTime()
methods.comment: * Returns the time this rule was created, represented as milliseconds since the epoch.

methods.name: public void setConditionId(Uri conditionId)
methods.comment: * Sets the representation of the state that causes this rule to become active.

methods.name: public void setInterruptionFilter(@InterruptionFilter int interruptionFilter)
methods.comment:
* Sets the interruption filter that is applied when this rule is active.
     * @param interruptionFilter The do not disturb mode to enter when this rule is active.

methods.name: public void setName(String name)
methods.comment: * Sets the name of this rule.

methods.name: public void setModified(boolean modified)
methods.comment:
* Sets modified state of this rule.
     * @hide

methods.name: public void setConfigurationActivity(@Nullable ComponentName componentName)
methods.comment:
* Sets the configuration activity - an activity that handles
     * {@link NotificationManager#ACTION_AUTOMATIC_ZEN_RULE} that shows the user more information
     * about this rule and/or allows them to configure it. This is required to be non-null for rules
     * that are not backed by {@link android.service.notification.ConditionProviderService}.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
